remarks: The subring module inherits a zero from its ring.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Dec-2014.)
statement:
sralmod0.a $e |- ( ph -> A = ( ( subringAlg ` W ) ` S ) ) $.
sralmod0.z $e |- ( ph -> .0. = ( 0g ` W ) ) $.
sralmod0.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ ( Base ` W ) ) $.
sralmod0 $p |- ( ph -> .0. = ( 0g ` A ) ) $.
